settings.title: How does Key By Photo work?
settings.content:
Key By Photo is a service by Tomâ€™s Key Company which allows you to take photos of your key and upload them on our portal. Once submitted weâ€™ll process a cut for your key in 24-48 hours.

For all the details on Key By Photo please visit our Tomâ€™s Key Help Center article here.

settings.title: What do I do if Iâ€™ve lost all my working keys?
